title:
11b01 - Blueprints and
plans.
text:
Employees engaged in
the preparation of blueprints, sketches, plans, and the like, are covered on an
individual basis if, the blueprints, et cetera, move either directly or
indirectly in interstate commerce. The preparation of the blueprints, et
cetera, constitutes production of goods for interstate commerce.
html: Employees engaged in the preparation of blueprints, sketches, plans, and the like, are covered on an individual basis if, the blueprints, et cetera, move either directly or indirectly in interstate commerce. The preparation of the blueprints, et cetera, constitutes production of goods for interstate commerce.
